content.text:
# 22nd Empire Awards

| site               = London, England
| host               =
| director           =
| best_film          = Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
| best_british       = I, Daniel Blake
| most_awards        = Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (4)
| most_nominations   = Rogue One: A Star Wars Story (9)
| channel            =
| duration           =
| last               = 21st
| next               = 23rd
}}
The 22nd Empire Awards ceremony (officially known as the Jameson Empire Awards), presented by the British film magazine Empire, honored the best films of 2016. The ceremony took place on 19 March 2017 in London, England.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable
|-

** The Girl with All the Gifts
|-
